channel.title: Lock
channel.description:
Hey, now i confess i don't use private servers and personally i don't really like to get involved (no offence!) but you see i'm a bit stuck and i thought you're community would be the best to ask. Now i don't know how many of you heard about the thing where when you change one number of the runescape game code it changes to stellardawn (a weird hybrid of runescape and something else that gives some strange extra options like face here) but currently it says stellardawn above the runescape loading bar. Previously however (before it said stellardawn) it said mechscape. Now i am trying to get hold of the old runescape.jar file from when it said mechscape above the loading bar. If anyone could help me get this working i would be amazingly greatfull!
Here are some useful links:
http://www.mechscapeworld.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=9060
http://www.mechscapeworld.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=7895&hl=loading
http://www.mechscapeworld.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=9088
Note: We never managed to log on to the mechscape version so i don't mind if it is only up to the menu!
Thanks!

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

sounds like ur using a 508 client or higher…
with these types of clients, its very hard to find ones that havent had their java files hidden/signed so the client cannot be edited and just the class files are left.
btw because this is to do with your client, it’s in the wrong section.

Read full topic
